author: Nintendo of America
description:
Let vengeance lead you to victory in Overwatch 2 Season 20, launching Dec 9, 2025 on Nintendo Switch: https://nintendo.com/us/store/products/overwatch-2-switch/?utm_source=SW&utm_medium=soytnoa&utm_campaign=P1064-06&utm_id=P1064-06

A new villain steps into the spotlight with the arrival of Overwatch 2's first official melee Damage Hero, Vendetta. With unmatched mobility, devastating close-range power, and a hunger for domination, Vendetta fights to reclaim her father’s legacy with deep ties to Talon and the next chapter of Overwatch 2’s global story. 

Stadium levels up once again with Doomfist and Wuyang stepping into the arena, and the arrival of a brand new Control map. Receive a rank reset and chase new rewards as you climb up the leaderboards!

Deck the halls as you brawl with the wintery cosmetics in the Season 20 Battle Pass. And with the 80 Mythic Prisms you’ll earn, bring some western flair to your festivities with the new Divine Desperado Cassidy Mythic Skin. 

Winter Wonde
title: Overwatch 2 – Season 20: Vendetta Official Trailer – Nintendo Switch

author: Nintendo of America
description: Adventure through Hyrule by diving in, saddling up, or take to the skies. Enjoy The Legend of #Zelda: #TearsOfTheKingdom - #NintendoSwitch2 Edition today.
title: Many ways to explore with Link.​
